name: anoint-array-api-tests
description: Comprehensive API integration testing suite for ANOINT Array e-commerce platform

scripts.help:
echo '
ðŸ“‹ Available test commands:
  npm test - Run all tests
  npm run test:api - Basic API tests
  npm run test:webhooks - Payment webhook tests

  npm run test:flows - End-to-end flow tests
  npm run test:performance - Performance tests
  npm run test:shipping - Shipping API only
  npm run test:payments - Payment API only
  npm run test:quick - Quick API validation
  npm run clean - Remove test reports
'

author: APIHammer Testing Suite
